entities.description: Mean use of alcohol in the past month, segmented by gender.
Categorization based on gender where male=1 and female=2.
Statistical mean estimates for alcohol use stored in matrix M.
Sample sizes for calculations stored in matrix N.
Weighted sample sizes for calculations stored in matrix W.
Design effect calculated and stored in matrix D.
Variances for calculations stored in matrix S.
Total estimates for alcohol use stored in matrix M.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the mean alcohol use in the past month segmented by gender.
Indicates the gender categorization for the respondent.
Specifies the mean estimates for past month alcohol use stored in matrix M.
Defines the sample sizes used for the calculations of past month alcohol use stored in matrix N.
Specifies the weighted sample sizes used for calculations, stored in matrix W.
Defines the design effects calculated for the survey, stored in matrix D.
Specifies the variances for calculations, stored in matrix S.
Defines the total estimates for past month alcohol use, stored in matrix M.
